## constructUrl variable

Format a root-relative URL based on provided path and query string key-value pairs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructUrl: ({ path, querySegments, }: {
    path: string;
    querySegments?: {
        [key: string]: string | number | null | undefined;
    } | undefined;
}) => string
```
